title: Tracked Tokens Configuration
description: Configuration file for tokens that are hardcoded in style dictionary and need change tracking

color.description: Color tokens that are hardcoded in style dictionary

typography.description: Typography tokens that are hardcoded in style dictionary

spacing.description: Spacing tokens that are hardcoded in style dictionary

sizing.description: Sizing tokens that are hardcoded in style dictionary

borders.description: Border tokens that are hardcoded in style dictionary

shadows.description: Shadow tokens that are hardcoded in style dictionary

motion.description: Motion/animation tokens that are hardcoded in style dictionary

watchPatterns.description: File patterns to watch for token changes

pathChanges.description: Token path/name changes break hardcoded references

valueChanges.description: Token value changes may affect visual consistency

instructions: 1. When you hardcode a token path in style dictionary, ADD IT to the appropriate section above
2. Include the EXACT path as used in your code (e.g., 'ob.s.color.neutral.no-color')
3. Group tokens by type (color, typography, spacing, etc.)
4. Add a descriptive comment about where/how the token is used
"ob.c.button.color.fg.primary.enabled",  // Used in Button component primary variant
- Monitor ONLY the tokens listed in this file
- Alert on path changes, deletions, or structural modifications
- Generate migration guides when breaking changes occur
- Create detailed reports for token architects
- Keep this file updated when adding new hardcoded token references
- Review tracked tokens during code reviews
- Use semantic token paths, not primitive token references
